Copyright and company information
item.description:
Dr Will Parry Ltd. is a company limited by shares based in London, UK (registered in England and Wales under company number 09051942). This website is owned and run by Dr Will Parry, Director of Dr Will Parry Ltd.

Content published on this website represents the personal and/or professional views, experiences and opinions of Dr Will Parry at the time of writing, and does not represent in any way the views, experiences or opinions of any individuals or organisations he may or may not work with or for.
